title: Higher than normal ping
body:
so normally i get about 30 ping playing on oce servers, during the last couple of days my ping has been about 100 constantly, there are no other sources hogging bandwith on my network and doing a speed test from Sydney andi am getting about 27 ping. I do have optus NBN though so i am not sure if that has anything to do with said problem

http://www.speedtest.net/result/7295121687

replies.body:
Give this bad boy a go: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367

And this one a sus: https://lagreport.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/

If those don't help you at all, try running through the steps here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Running ping test
Pinging www.google.com [216.58.220.100] with 32 bytes of data:
Reply from 216.58.220.100: bytes=32 time=30ms TTL=53
Reply from 216.58.220.100: bytes=32 time=28ms TTL=53
Reply from 216.58.220.100: bytes=32 time=31ms TTL=53
Reply from 216.58.220.100: bytes=32 time=32ms TTL=53
Ping statistics for 216.58.220.100:
Packets: Sent = 4, Received = 4, Lost = 0 (0% loss),
Approximate round trip times in milli-seconds:
Minimum = 28ms, Maximum = 32ms, Average = 30ms

these are the results from the hextech repair tool, and yet im still getting that same 75-100 ping in game

Hmm. Are you on a wireless connection? If so I'd recommend switching to a wired one and seeing if the problem persists. Beyond that and what I've already pointed you to I can't really help you, so I'd suggest submitting a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
